com.orsoncharts.graphics3d

Class Utils2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orsoncharts.graphics3d.Utils2D

  • public class Utils2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility methods for 2D geometry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double area2(java.awt.geom.Point2D a, java.awt.geom.Point2D b, java.awt.geom.Point2D c)
      Calculates twice the area of a triangle for points specified in counter-clockwise order (if the points are specified in clockwise order the result will be negative).
      static double calculateTheta(java.awt.geom.Line2D line)
      Returns the angle of rotation (in radians) for the specified line.
      static java.awt.geom.Point2D centerPoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt0, java.awt.geom.Point2D pt1, java.awt.geom.Point2D pt2, java.awt.geom.Point2D pt3)
      Returns the point in the center of the four supplied points.

      Creates and returns a line that is perpendicular to the specified line.

      Creates and returns a line that is perpendicular to the specified line.
      static java.awt.Dimension findDimension(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] pts)
      Returns the dimensions of the smallest rectangle that could contain the supplied points.
      static double length(java.awt.geom.Line2D line)
      Returns the length of the line.
      static boolean spans(double value, double bound1, double bound2)
      Returns true if the specified value is spanned by the two bounds, and false otherwise.

      • spans

        public static boolean spans(double value,
                            double bound1,
                            double bound2)
        Returns true if the specified value is spanned by the two bounds, and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        value - the value.
        bound1 - the first boundary.
        bound2 - the second boundary.
        Returns:
        A boolean.

      • area2

        public static double area2(java.awt.geom.Point2D a,
                           java.awt.geom.Point2D b,
                           java.awt.geom.Point2D c)
        Calculates twice the area of a triangle for points specified in counter-clockwise order (if the points are specified in clockwise order the result will be negative).
        Parameters:
        a - the first point (null not permitted).
        b - the second point (null not permitted).
        c - the third point (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The area x 2.

      • centerPoint

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D centerPoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt0,
                                                java.awt.geom.Point2D pt1,
                                                java.awt.geom.Point2D pt2,
                                                java.awt.geom.Point2D pt3)
        Returns the point in the center of the four supplied points.
        Parameters:
        pt0 - point 0 (null not permitted).
        pt1 - point 1 (null not permitted).
        pt2 - point 2 (null not permitted).
        pt3 - point 3 (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The center point (never null).

      • findDimension

        public static java.awt.Dimension findDimension(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] pts)
        Returns the dimensions of the smallest rectangle that could contain the supplied points.
        Parameters:
        pts - an array of points (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The dimensions.

      • createPerpendicularLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D createPerpendicularLine(java.awt.geom.Line2D line,
                                                           double b,
                                                           double size,
                                                           java.awt.geom.Point2D opposingPoint)
        Creates and returns a line that is perpendicular to the specified line.
        Parameters:
        line - the reference line (null not permitted).
        b - the base point, expressed as a percentage along the length of the reference line.
        size - the size or length of the perpendicular line.
        opposingPoint - an opposing point, to define which side of the reference line the perpendicular line will extend (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The perpendicular line.

      • createPerpendicularLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D createPerpendicularLine(java.awt.geom.Line2D line,
                                                           java.awt.geom.Point2D pt1,
                                                           double size,
                                                           java.awt.geom.Point2D opposingPoint)
        Creates and returns a line that is perpendicular to the specified line.
        Parameters:
        line - the reference line (null not permitted).
        pt1 - a point on the reference line (null not permitted).
        size - the length of the new line.
        opposingPoint - an opposing point, to define which side of the reference line the perpendicular line will extend (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The perpendicular line.

        line - the line (null not permitted).
        Returns:
